Title: Story of Wine
Writer: Cheol-ha Lee, Nil Kwonji, Tae-Yeon Won (narration co-writer)
Actors: Ki-woo Lee, Greena Park, Marcos Benjamin Lee, Hyeon-jin Seo
Plot: Which wine or story do you want to choose? A Story of the Sweet Taste, a Story of the Luxurious Needs, or a Story of the Passionate Matchmaker?
